abstract: General Motors said on Monday that it was buying 50 percent of the Italian diesel engine maker VM Motori from Penske and would introduce a new high-performance V6 diesel engine built by VM Motori.
lead_paragraph: General Motors said on Monday that it was buying 50 percent of the Italian diesel engine maker VM Motori from Penske and would introduce a new high-performance V6 diesel engine built by VM Motori.

headline.main: G.M. Buys Stake in Diesel Engine Maker
